About
Arjun

Arjun is a Cyber Security Consultant at a global technology consulting firm with significant hands-on experience in building and enhancing Security Operations Center (SOC) and Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI) capabilities for organizations across diverse industries, including government agencies. He brings forth a robust combination of technical and non-technical skills to help design and build modern, automated, and highly scalable Cyber Defense solutions while continuously serving as a trusted advisor and partner for clients.

Certifications & Badges

  • arcX Foundation Level Threat Intelligence Analyst
  • The OSINTion Accelerated Introduction to Intelligence
  • The OSINTion Alternative & Advanced Search Engine Intelligence
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
  • AttackIQ Foundations of Operationalizing MITRE ATT&CK
  • AttackIQ Foundations of Purple Teaming
  • Purple Academy by Picus Security: Fundamentals of Modern Log Management Practices
  • IBM Resilient SOAR Foundations
  • IBM Security Resilient Technical Sales Foundations - Level 200
  • IBM Certified Application Developer - Cloud Platform V2
  • Polaris Project: Polaris's Human Trafficking 101 Training
